lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back here in a few minutes, and we'll pick up where we left off. See you guys shortly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. So, first, before it begins, our winner of the chatroom who's going to win the awesome dice box from Wyrmwood is Thaign, T-H-A-I-G-N.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So congratulations, we'll get your information and get that sent to you, well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fight!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The box is really sweet, We just saw it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, as you guys have just taken in as much of the scenery as you can here within someplace in an alley in the center of the City of Dis. Where no matter where you look, the creepy distant tower of iron seems to follow--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Dis tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- your vision no matter where on the horizon you glance. Ever watching, ever present.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Send up a flare.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While we can do that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's put our hoods and cloaks on. Weren't you going to make yourself look like a tiefling?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah. I can do it right now. Is anyone watching?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see if anybody is watching right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's an omnipresent iron tower that's watching.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a-- I mean, iron tower?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's more the 'omnipresent' part that was really the point of that, but yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you said an eye on a tower, and I was like, that's a different tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a different tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's copyrighted, I'm well aware.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get indoors. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I perceive anywhere that looks like where travelers would stay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll do the same.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's better than me. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly your shoulder, you can see the heat of the actual wall with just a brief contact to your body has begun to burn--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and singe the outside of your cloak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh crap!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pat your hair, pat your hair, pat your hair, pat your hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow, ow, ow, ow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, from just peeking around the corner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From just leaning and touching the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groans) Ugh, it's Tucson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You immediately notice that the bottom elements of your shoes are melting a little bit on the bottom with your steps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh. Good thing rubber doesn't exist here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The city itself is just this emanating source of perpetual heat. You're already sweating in the presence here, and as you glance around the corner and look at these buildings that rise up, you can see the architecture is hooked to the corner as the monolithic deep reds and blacks and grays that everything's built from, nothing belies an exterior that would seem to be welcoming to a traveling pack of people, at least not from your current standpoint.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And remind us, it's dim or it's not super bright here, is it? Dark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's not super dark either. Imagine a very very very very cloudy day around sunset.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. I don't know what to do other than to-- Does it look like there's anybody around us that can see us? Anybody watching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Are you trying to be stealthy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I'm glancing subtly, trying to look like a badass but also stealthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And they both just keep walking, seemingly not affected or alerted by your presence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking about each side of the road as you go, there is a lot of movement through these streets, there are a lot of creatures, all sorts of weird shapes, you see a lot of that weird fleshy mass that you saw stepping forward, there's clusters of them all over. Many of them seem to be herded or pushed, some seem to be almost chained together in places and being dragged around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it like that thing we ran into in-- Was it Kraghammer? Where were we where that thing was like a mash of bones and stuff?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, in the field of bone shards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, right, right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, imagine a very, very rotund person that is perpetually melting out of clay, and-- let me just show you a picture, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it like a fondue pot of nine people in one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a single face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a walking shit sack, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pizza the Hutt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew! You can't even see legs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just these, like a liquified person that is just a somewhat-shifting, burbling forth fleshy sack that occasionally-- you can see like the mouth and what looks almost like a face that is ever-screaming and writhing in pain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That seems awful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This guy needs some calcium.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, imma put my glasses on so I can see it again! Oh, you already closed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can bring it back up again, it's all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right next to that beautiful picture of a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah! Well, you've already seen the other creatures before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that's your fun one there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so creepy. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But they're being herded around. You see smaller creatures, you see imps, which you've encountered before: tiny winged leathery humanoid creatures that flutter around and seem to be more keeping a peripheral view, an overhead view of the goings-on of each one of these clusters of entities being pulled through the city. You see a handful attending each of these that move along, these humanoid devils that have long polearms, and from their dark, almost like bluish-purple skin, what looks to be almost like a series of jagged pointed tendrils that jut from the bottom of their chin and almost like writhe and curl as they push forward, occasionally shoving their weapon into the side of these things and just getting them back on track as they wander off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see anything that looks like normal Exandrians? People that are just like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the very-- at this moment, no. And you get the sense that, at least, they're not super common. (laughs) Almost everyone that is currently walking through the street in this particular intersection seems to be of some sort of devilish heritage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. I go back to our group and say, well, I was spotted for sure. Nobody seemed to pay me very much mind, but there's nobody here that looks like us. I don't know if we've happened to pop into a particular area of the city that is inhabited mostly by devils, but that's where we are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we know what layer we're in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dis would be--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What layer of Hell? It's like, the third, fourth? Second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dis is two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we gotta find the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What level Dis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Open market, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, the market.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we find the market, we'll find an inn. Find an inn, we'll find a place to drink and get a room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please don't make me be the one that remembered all the shit about Dis. I mean, I am The Grand Poobah de Doink of All of Dis and That, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's true, you would know!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Y'all motherfuckers is coming with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, I can already see that going poorly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should put our hoods up and just generally act like we belong here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just walk with purpose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think if I do an Alter Self here that people will notice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you do it quickly? I mean--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I can do it at will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're in an alleyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, let's all make the changing circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just shield me, like we're changing at the beach.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you just lean in front of Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look casual. Don't touch the wall, you'll burn!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ahh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which actually, you do immediately take four points of fire damage as you do so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aww, poor baby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww, buddy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put some mayonnaise on it, you'll feel better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mayonnaise (squelching noise).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, are you changing your appearance?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you imagine how sour Grog must smell all the time? He just has mayonnaise on him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Curdled dairy at all times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or how much I love it? Sam said he can cast Alter Self on himself plus three others.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, I'm working on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he can do it on others?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, people who can actually cast the spell, they can cast on other people, but you as a druid ability, you can only do it right on yourself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, copy. Cool. I'm going to look like kind of a vague cross between Whitney and Zahra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and as you do that, Taryon immediately goes, "Oh, great idea!" and he turns himself into-- he pulls out a small object and clicks it for a second, as it does, his form shifts into an almost identical-looking--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Female?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) No, a male tiefling. And then goes, "Who else, who else? Who else would like my blessing?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know? Hold off on that. I'm not saying it's not a good idea, but maybe we should workshop it. What--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to be one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I knew you would!" And he comes forward and pulls another one out and as he breaks this small capsule in your direction, this burst of arcane energy hits you and all of a sudden, your form shifts into an almost identical-looking tiefling; same colors--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, change it up-- stop, Taryon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wh-- okay! Ah!" and he tries to finagle with it for the last second as the spell just about takes hold of your shape goes slightly more, and he goes, "Uh, blue?" and you're a little more blue. It's the tail-end, like the "Eh?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, hang on, we don't want to be--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm talking it out. You can do that to how many more of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two more people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two more!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Kidding, he knew.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take one, why not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Grog can look like Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like a handful of tieflings and Grog is better than us as we are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would agree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes ahead and takes one--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But make him more red. Pink!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, hang on, how long does Alter Self last when it's just a spell? Because if we were going to try and eat some food, and take a break, then maybe we should do that first? Are we still doing that, or are we just going head-on into this? Feel like our plan's already dissolving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no, we need to get a-- we need to eat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're in a back alley.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We gotta walk through this town.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can find it too, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm looking it up, hold on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Alter Self lasts for one hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, concentration though, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well that'd-- concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and so--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we go into a fight, it doesn't matter. I'll take grey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, by all means!" and he hands you the small capsule-- It's almost like he enchants the coins, you're actually casting the spells on yourself, so you are concentrating on the spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I guess we will get through this city and eat a Heroes' Feast when we get to our destination?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and then we'll just Alter Self again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I can do this on my own then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, by all means."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck it, all white.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: White?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You become an albino--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- tiefling of your own intrinsic design.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Way to totally blend in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very, very unique.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, rogue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think everybody here dresses like the Raven Queen's butler? I mean--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have encountered an albino tiefling before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smartypants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lillith.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lillith was an albino?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lillith.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why she was so pale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was so cute!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can say you're sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not? You should be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're wrong, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right! Let's find ourselves a marketplace and an inn!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And a rakshasa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go. I am going to step out into the street.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Act like you belong here. Act tough and cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With pomp and circumstance and purpose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I join Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please don't write things down while I do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not nice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Act like you belong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why, whatever do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: People will buy it. We just walk looking straight ahead; don't look around too much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep yep!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 10% what you say, 90% how you say it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I act like me, I think I'm going to be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I act like Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's also going to be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys step out into the main road, you can see the cracked stones that make up the walkway here. Even just walking through here, though you feel confident in your placement, the presence here you're still getting used to, and it's something about the air, or you feel just a little dizzy as you're still adjusting to the heat, to the placement, to the strange ever-so-faintly non-Euclidian structure to the landscape around you. It's forcing you to consciously right your posture and pay more attention to your surroundings than you normally would. There's just something about the presence here that's unwelcoming. You can see there are a number of other streets that head in any direction. It's hard to tell which way is further into the city and which is further out, it's so vast. Even the City of Brass or Ank'harel in their size, none of them seem to really scrape the surface of the sheer immensity of the City of Dis by comparison.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This should be easy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't know from reading anything, I wouldn't have a vague idea of where to go? I have a theory at the moment, but it's pretty light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you read, it was mostly about the structure of the society, there was no well-written cartographer's experience--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hitchhiker's Guide to the City of Dis. I say we head to the tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The tower's in every direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, whichever direction it is, that's the way we'll head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. That's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And also that way!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some people go both ways.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like if I were going to build a giant tower that couldn't be ignored, I would have that be the center of anything and every place. It may not even matter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's take a stroll and see a lay of the land.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we start taking a stroll, can I do a nature check to see if I can spot any native beasts, insects, etc.? Native animals, birds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Critters, and the usual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. This would be more perception, actually because you're trying to pick up details in the scenery.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Perception check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nature to understand if you knew what they were.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a shithole roll: 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, occasionally, catch what looks to be some element of small, flying, buzzing pests, but they're different than what you're used to. The brief glances you get of one that comes nearby, it seems to have eight sets of wings and some horrid-looking pincers on the front and looks like a nasty denizen of the scenery. And immediately, you're like, "Ugh!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I lean over to Vex, and I say, oi. In an effort to blend in, should we just kill a random person?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like only if it's called for, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just thought of it, so does that mean it's called for? Is that what you do here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, probably not just yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They might really like it here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, they could, but they also thrive on order.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I feel like that's a little out of order.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. I'm glad I asked you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep doing that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Asking you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why is our life so much like Vaudeville?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do like the theater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think a Pass Without a Trace spell would be beneficial here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's concentration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why try to be complicated?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's just own this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's own it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take a walk. Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No fear!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Strut!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I strut.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Maybe we can drop a little bit of dust of tracelessness behind us, though, so we're-- no?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, let's not make a scene. I'm going to look for signs to look for the sorts of people who are walking around, if there seems to be a flow of traffic, if people seem to be going in a direction, coming from a direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Getting a sense of the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While heading towards the tower?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While heading towards the tower to make sure that I am trying to get a lay of the land so maybe I can see if we should veer off in a direction. I'm also looking for humans, someone who might speak Common.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And, are there stores, are there businesses? Are these all non-descript buildings, or does it all just look like the same shit? Or is it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are varying, but there's nothing here that looks like a welcoming shopfront. The structures are varied, but any of the signs or any of the scrollings that you see chiseled into the stonework and metal is not a language--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, it's like a hellish financial district, there's just nothing there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Loosely, yeah. It looks like Detroit on Halloween.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Purge!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Love you, Detroit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, man. Devil's Night, it's great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you follow. As Doty's (stomping) behind Tary, staying as close to the middle of all of you guys and shielding himself between your various bodies. You continue to follow Percival as you step through, paying attention. Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye out for anybody that looks like they're noticing us too much, anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, same.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural snitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural snitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are a problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may have to-- I'm aware that there's a lifespan on this die, that I may eventually need to put it away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are in hell. If it's going to come out anywhere--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you roll one more natural 20, it's just going to dissolve into gold dust and float away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Heads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. One of these days, your contract will come to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm well aware.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you lift up Taliesin's mohawk, you can see the little tiny, little points. Little horns.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or the maze. You walk for the next ten or so minutes. Two things you notice, looking for patterns and elements of the city around. There does seem to be a general direction of, not individuals as such, but a lot of these fleshy masses, which you've read about in the book, they're referred to as lemures. They are fallen damned souls that have been tortured into this specific form that are the lowest base level of devil that exists here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a fleshy mass, Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to go to bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But a lot of them seem to be going in this certain direction. It's difficult to maintain focus on the direction of the tower if you have to avert your eyes. However, if you're looking in a particular direction, it doesn't follow your vision when you move, it's whenever you have to look away and change your perspective on the horizon, that's when it appears elsewhere. So, you assert yourself in a direction and maintain that way. After about ten, 15 minutes, there's no discernable gaining of distance on the tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, for fuck's sake.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In that case, I'm going to find a lemure and inquire sternly of directions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sternly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do not appear to be currently attended at the moment. And, as you approach one is there like (gurgling).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kuthok.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pained gurgling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Marketplace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pained gurgling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is fucking disgusting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no language. It looks like it can't really communicate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really sad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It kind of is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's depressing. All right. What building are they currently chained to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's long on one side and then half the size on the other, and it juts up like a monolith that comes from these two hooks at the top. There's no signs or particular language on its exterior, but there does appear to be a doorway, a big, black metal iron doorway that is closed maybe a foot to the left of them. You're--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like people are coming in and out of that building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wait a moment, you can find out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can post up and see, or just walk on in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't recommend walking on in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're walking and nothing's changing. Do we want to stay put for a while and see what happens?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, our surroundings are changing, we're just not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crashing noise) At this point, the door shifts open with a slam, there's a burst of phosphorous-type clouded fume that drifts out from the interior as, curling down, looming from the inside, another one of those large, lanky, skeletal-looking devils with the giant scorpion tail lurches out, and sees all of you clustered over, and begins to rush up quickly and grabs the side of where the hook is jammed into the wall and just breaks it out with its bare strength, and yanks the lemures closer. (speaks Infernal) You see its jaw almost seems to disconnect and unhinge for a moment as it gets impossibly long and its tongue (slurping noise) and begins to just walk away from you guys down the road, dragging these lemures behind it from the chains.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as he opened the door, I wanted to get a look inside of where he came out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was almost a 20, but it was a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was just some sort of a shelf, bit of furniture in the side there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hotis, where the fuck are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's a fucking place we can have a stupid feast?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we can get to a safe, quiet place, I can do a Locate Creature spell and see if I can find him. I can also scry on him, but I need to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need something--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something not in this back alley of a street.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did that devil who just left leave the door wide open, or did it shut it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the door slammed open and as it walked towards you guys, slammed it shut behind it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which way did the creature go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Loosely the same direction as where you were walking for the tower.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep walking in that direction--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See if we can gently catch up, just to the vague periphery, so if I can see them, then great, and if not, oh well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you following this group? Is that what's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (indecisive noise) From a gentle long distance, and not with great intent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was he talking to the lemures, or to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Talking to you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To back the fuck off? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were clustered around, apparently, his charge or--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His, yeah, his people. "Back the fuck off from my people", yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a chain devil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this was a bone devil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a bone devil? All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can show you what that looks like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This means I could theoretically turn into him now that I've met them, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That won't go poorly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get. The fuck. Out of my nightmares.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (Minnesotan accent) "Hello, we're from outta town, y'know?"

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (Minnesotan accent) "Oh, don't ya know?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (Minnesotan accent) "Yo, I got my Polaroid with me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, hello."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: "Oh, hello."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we all fall out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we all die. Too much Fargo lately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you tail this from a distance, go ahead and make a stealth check, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's-- 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not-- (indecisive noise) Keeping my distance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's D-Rollin'.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They see me-- no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love Laura bailing so fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are following Percival's lead along the roads here, the heat is starting to really crawl under your armor-- those of you who are wearing it, you're fine, Grog. You watch as the lemures are dragged off into an alley to the right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they go to an alley, then I'm not going to go down an alley. I'm going to walk by and maybe look down the alley from across the street, but I'm not-- I'm trying to stay on main roads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see them being pulled down the alleyway, and then to the left around the corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No-- That feels like a trap to me. That feels like the sort of thing I would do if I wanted to shank someone in an alley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've done that, actually, that's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I knew you had.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any buildings that look like people are coming in and out raucously?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if we walked for a while and looked back. Let's give it ten minutes, and then we'll figure something out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll take a left at the next main thoroughfare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to keep an eye out for anybody watching us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While I'm looking for buildings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You do hear the occasional screech in the air, as you see these winged entities in the distance just (screeching). As they just dive through and around the top of the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we recognise what they are? Are they wyverns? What are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there's a humanoid aspect to their bodies but they're just beyond the general red glow of the city to make out their details.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try and start focusing on that for the next walk. When one gets down close, I want to see if I can see what it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some appear to be larger. Some have long tails that draw behind them, their giant leathery wings, and they just glide through. You get a glance at one that seems to have a human torso and legs that are hanging at its sides as it swoops through, like a sentinel just watching over the city. A lot seem to be doing arcs to and from the tower as you watch these patterns--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could fly up in the air and see if I can spot a market.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could Beast Shape into something that's natural--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Better? Well, I don't like anybody going up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten minutes' travel, Percival, by the way? Still not anywhere near closer to the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Weird thought: what if we try to walk away from the tower?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is no walking away from the tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is stupid. What if I think about being in front of the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you just think about it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see that same bone devil that earlier you saw emerge from the side alleyway about two blocks up, still clutching those three other lemures behind it by chain. It walks up to another bone devil that seems to be sitting off to the side, and is in the process of scratching the side of its horrible, bony chin and jaw. It comes up to it, and they both speak and snarl. You cannot read their lips, because they don't really have lips, and you don't know Infernal. But they both almost become a unit, and walking side-by-side head further down that path, with the three chained lemures behind them. Glancing over, you do see, as you've been focusing on the ground and around you, look up, and the tower has shifted position down to the end of that roadway. You thinking of it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that what did it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's still the same distance it ever has been. In the process of losing its sight from your peripheral, due to other buildings closing off your vision-- As soon as you lose sight of it entirely and reassess where your vision is on the horizon, there the tower is once more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it always feel like it's dead ahead of us, all the time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's always off to the side, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It changes. As soon as you become aware of the horizon, it becomes oriented wherever that awareness is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about I watch any of the people, the humanoids, or anything like that, that are together-- Can I see them talking, does it look like any of them are speaking Common, if I'm trying to read their lips--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're quite a ways away from you. You're not able to make out any detail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll walk in the direction, just get in the area that they're in, so that I can try to read their lips.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once again, I want to keep an eye out, because I had a shitty perception check, for any birds, bats, beasts that I see flying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No birds, no bats, no beasts. There isn't a whole lot of indigenous wildlife within the Hells, it seems. Or at least nothing that would be considered a beast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Insects?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even the insect you saw earlier, or the insect-like creature, it had twisted, fiendish qualities to it on a very micro scale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was an ambassador.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It probably was! That's the thing, it probably was!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to trail my sister by like ten feet and watch her back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're moving closer to get a view of lip-reading. What's everyone else doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the ground as hot as the walls are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. Even as you're walking, you've grown somewhat accustomed to the uncomfortable heat that your boots are currently mustering. Thankfully, you guys are wearing footwear designed to endure environmental hazards, or magical footwear, for some of you. But you imagine if you were to stand still for too long in one place, it would probably end up damaging any sort of regular footwear worn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus. It's like a parking lot in Texas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Venice in August. Beach, not--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything about the humans in particular? Are they wearing anything unusual, or do they have any company with them that might denote why they're allowed to roam about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two that you see ahead of you, a man and a woman, the man has stark white hair that is almost wet, and brushed very tight to the back of the skull, with a series of black and red markings or tattoos, or some sort of scar, that goes across one side of his face. A very, very thick nose piercing that connects to a chain that links to the back of his ear and is wearing layered, black leather armor. The woman, who is currently conversing with him on the other side, has long black hair with a shock of white that curls to the front. Her skin is a deep reddish brown, tan color, and her armor is a dull gray, like a cloth-patterned armor? But she seems to have at her side a very wicked-looking scimitar that is hanging at her belt, and she rests her arm on it, casually. You look just past them, and you can see they have two sacks resting on the ground as they're having this conversation, and a cage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Empty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's cocked. (deep voice) 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is to both get close enough to witness their conversation but not be noticed as overtly trying to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it even worth bringing it here? We've come this far. We already have the offer. Might as well go through with it. One of them talks about how they hate the Fetters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Fetters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Fetters.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) I bet it's one of those little dudes we had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then one of them goes, let's get going, this place makes me feel uncomfortable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I still can't see what they have in the cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Naked. You can't make out much more detail. You can't tell if it's male or female. It appears to be medium- to light-skinned. You can't get much detail beyond that from this distance, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How big is this cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's maybe four foot by three foot. A little smaller, actually. It would be more like three foot by two foot, because it looks pretty cramped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to walk up to them. Before they walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they both start turning to walk, one of them--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to be casual as I do it. I just walk up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there is a couple of chains fixed to the front of this cage and there is a handle of some kind that the guy lifts. There are small wheels you can now see that are fixed onto the cage that you can now see as it rolls--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I walk up and I say--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The woman immediately turns and sees you, and her hand moves from resting on the pommel of the blade to grasping the handle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Are you with me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten feet behind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I signal at you to come over. I don't want to look like I'm talking to the people, yet. I'm just walking in their direction, and I lean over to my brother and say, God I hate this place, don't you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep. Pretty much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (exhales) It's so hot. I wish we were back home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything fucking looks the same.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nondescript bullshit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I make eye contact with the woman as I say it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a subtle deception check. They are intensely paranoid, it seems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cell phone rings)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I help you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, what?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were staring at me, darling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You, unless I'm mistaken, approached our space."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you had claimed it. Sorry. Everything here's claimed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She turns around, and gives him the expression of, fucking shove off, and he takes the chain, and begins to tug it and they both walk away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I just want to find a fucking tavern!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just let them walk away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but as they walk away I want to look at the fucking cage and really get a good look at what they had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing inside, you're not sure how old or how young, but there is a definitely beaten, wounded young man. Between the streaks of blood and visible gashes and lash marks, the skin seems pretty vibrant and clean. This is a creature that was taken here. This person was taken here against their interest and is being dragged in a direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, before they walk off I go, oi! You made a deal for that one yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They turn back and look at you. "Yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do you go? I have something I'd like to sell as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We don't share our clients." And they both just keep walking back in the direction they were going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not working. I'm trying so hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're doing great. It was amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Oh god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm tired of walking. We've been walking all--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's about 20 feet from you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've been walking all day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not even turning around. They are just walking away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you whispering that to me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I am whispering to you. It didn't work. We find other people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am currently spitting on the ground and watching it evaporate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it does. It's like (psh).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, do I see a tavern around here? It seems like a busy sort of street.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You can keep walking and looking for some sort of a tavern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there any other people around? I'm going to give a roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, I mean, there are people, those are the only two humans that you had seen in the vicinity. Again, you saw--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tieflings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- you saw a handful of tieflings a little even further down the road and you see a few humanoid-like devils that are just covered in barbs and spines that seem to walk in spurts, like they'll step, step, and then dash a few steps and then stop and then glance around nervously and then continue forward. Roughly human-sized, maybe a little smaller.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is everyone here afraid that they're going to be murdered at any corner?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, obviously-- just us. Let's try this proper. I'm going to start walking and see if I can make eye contact with anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to try to make eye contact with these people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys following them or are you staying back with your party?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I am walking in their direction anyway--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have caught up to them now and Percival is apparently walking forward so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, where are you going?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just trying to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you notice no one here makes eye contact with you? It's really weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, they did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I follow in the general direction of those people that walked off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to head toward the tieflings as well. Which I think is the same direction anyway, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As you are following from a distance these two humans, the two tieflings that were conversing split off. One walks across the way and vanishes into an alley. The other one joins, not the humans, but seems to be walking in the same direction if maybe about 20 or so feet ahead of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we walk a little bit, I just want to covertly heat up my hands, light them up a little bit and then touch the wall to see if it burns me as well a little bit. Just graze my fingers along it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sizzle) You immediately take four points of fire damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even though my mantle of the tempest, I ignore extreme heat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do ignore extreme heat from a general air, like being on a desert. It doesn't prevent you from touching a fire and burning your hands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's what I was curious about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stove. Stove. Stove! Stove! Ahh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: S'good, s'good. It feels good. It feels good. Stove cat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stove cat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the rolling clouds, you hear a distant clap of thunder roll through the vicinity as the occasional flashes of bluish-white and green ash clouds on top of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those humans are both gone, out of sight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're still in sight, you guys are slowly following from a distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said they split off? They split away from each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The humans kept going. The tieflings that he was following, there were two of them that were loosely stepping in, they split off. One vanished into an alley, the other began walking in the same direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we talk to this guy? Because I'm about to. We're fucking dicking around, here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to ask somebody where to find a pub or an inn. Not trying to be coy. Not trying to be interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can't pretend shit here. Let's just go talk to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, are we interesting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, we are interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as three different flying imp-like creatures suddenly dart off the nearby buildings and dart past you, and you watch as the two humans stop and drag themselves off to the side. The tiefling that was walking not far ahead of them takes a few steps back and waits patiently. As you watch, stepping through one of the adjacent roadways, about three or four small devils that have these barbed spines that stick out of their body in all directions come walking through, carrying these little spears.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We step off to the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I push everybody to the side and down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a procession behind them you see a familiar creature. You see a massive, rippling red-muscled pit fiend come stepping through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not the one! Not that one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not the same one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said a familiar creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the creature is familiar. You're not--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't mean it's

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it crosses the path, the demons and the cart continue past out of view, and eventually the various entities walking the street before pick up their pace and continue on like nothing happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: You are seeing more humanoids of different races, you're seeing more of the lesser devils coalescing in these center spaces, and you do see what appears to be some semblance of what you would call a devilish tavern. There is no music, there is no lively chatter, but you do see what looks to be chairs, you look to see what seems to be a common area where some entities are sitting and partaking in food of some kind.

lines.text: As you're keeping an eye out, the gleaming bright albino tiefling does seem to, at least, have caught the eye of a handful of humanoid-- it looks like humans, you see they're trailing behind you by a good hundred or so feet--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They are following us?

lines.text: -- but they appear to be following you. One appears to be a-- it looks dwarvish in how stout it is, but it's hard to tell at this distance, and the humanoid creature to the right of it is human-sized, but it is wrapped in a wreath of dark chains that seem to cover most features, the face and the torso. You can see bits of skin and muscle peeking through, but it's just an entire robe of very tightly-wound chains, just massed around its torso and legs and arms.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: The edges of them almost hook upward, and within the inside, you can see a handful of these similar spined devils, that you've seen as part of that procession earlier with the pit fiend, are sitting and ravenously feasting on some nondescript purplish-red meat. You can see the tables, actually, are almost like troughs, and the center of it seems to be almost a funnel, where all the blood and gore that is--

Beyond that, in the corner, you do see sitting--

His hair has this curl and he has a whole series of scratch marks across his face that just-- long, deep-set scars that leave this very marred visage, and he grins this toothy grin as you enter. You can see he's just-- his chest hair that's exposed under his white tunic, and his leather apron that he has over the front of that. It's just a very, very disturbing grin when he smiles at you as you enter, and he sits up from his stool and walks over and puts his hands down, and as it puts its hands down, you can see them begin to burn his skin but you can now see these calloused fingers-- you can see he's been here for quite some time and has had his own way of adjusting to the atmosphere, and just leans in, (speaks Infernal).

While the entrance chamber seemed to be pretty brutal, the chambers that you were given-- they aren't next to each other. They're a little scattered as far as the rooms. Only maybe ten or so rooms in the whole establishment. But each room has a very well-crafted bed. There appear to be some well-made chairs of a similar stone material of the downstairs setup there, all having this weird, jagged stylings to their construct. The chamber's still hot as fuck, and it is an uncomfortable interior, but the bed itself does not appear to be bursting into flames. The material here is seemingly resistant to the heat in which it's in the proximity of.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you're going to be bottoming out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, hold on just a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just need another soul, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's add to Keyleth's guilt a little bit more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, it was already dead, Keyleth. Or maybe it was like the soul gems.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, that thing was still alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't say any of that. I've got to focus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm kidding, kidding, I'm totally kidding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here-- I'm sure it was somebody who murdered children, you know? It was probably a major arsehole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it was probably a really bad person, and now they're inside of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, not something else I'd want right now, no. None of these things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level spell is the scry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fifth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fifth? As soon as you cast the spell and center your vision on the idea of Hotis, the spell immediately fizzles and dissipates.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Son of a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a-- god--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you begin to remember, through your research of the rakshasa, up to a certain level of spells, 6th-level spells, they're immune to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it to the Nine-- or Second Layer of Hell. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, cast it at a higher level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, I'm going to try again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At what level?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to-- we're in for the night, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the plan. That's the intention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to eat a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All topped off at the moment, so whatever you do, we'll make up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we know if the Nine Hells have day and night the same way--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not topped off; I need four hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I touch Grog's shoulder and I give him four hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, just like that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ticklish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does this place have day and night the same way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll be eating a Heroes' Feast, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but are we going to scry first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah yeah yeah yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah! I'm going to do an 8th-level Scry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An 8th-level Scrying?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On Hotis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boom!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eat it, Hotis!

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Show me what you got!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ho-dis!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eat that scry!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's rolling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, he is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time, you grit your teeth. The space is already prepared for the first ritual you did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also give it a good ten minutes, let him get distracted and forget that he, maybe, just got scryed on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! You close your eyes, and this time, remembering both the original conflicts with him in the Quad Roads, the battle, which you recall was at the base of a statue of Dispater, the archdevil of this sphere of Hell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh fuck, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Way back when. You remember him falling off the top of the balcony with Vax--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then being stabbed by Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and using these memories, you focus on the essence of Hotis. Your vision suddenly pulls out of the top of this chamber that you're in, to a brief glance, just a flash over the horizon of the city, and there you see the ominous dark tower, for but a moment. Then there's a flash as your vision is pulled further into this cityscape of darkened, withering alleys, and the whole atmosphere as the core of this space that you guys are heading towards seems to be disheveled, ruined, destitute, and filthy. Your vision is dragged in that direction, to ground level, then below, and is brought, suddenly thrust into chambers, dark, bars, iron doors, a prison. A prison beneath the streets of the city. There's another flash. You see devils, dozens of them, walking guards, some larger than others. You see a flash of large, red leathery wings. You see something horned and dark, grinning beyond a metal door, and then beyond that door, there's another flash, and on the inside, you see tendrils of red flesh extending from the ceilings and the walls, all merging to a center small core. There you see this fleshy egg-like structure, about this large, that is suspended by these strands of muscle-y sinew, and there you see writhing and twisting within the membrane of this, a small, misshapen humanoid cat-like creature that is currently writhing on the inside. You can hear the faint squealing and screaming--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (high-pitched) Rakshasa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- in pain as Hotis, not yet fully formed, slowly torturing its way back to its full physical form, is just screaming with hatred, awaiting the moments of vengeance once the torturous pain that currently consumes its existence fades and it can once more plot its return to the Prime Material Plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it was in a prison underground, under the tower?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In a Faberge egg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Underneath this portion of the city, or a little ways ahead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Suspended by octopi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to go great!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything else? Anything else? Anything else? Did you see anything else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all you see. You just saw flashes just leading into this. You have no idea exactly where it is. All you saw were flashes of a prison under the city, and Hotis still incubating in this chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to get arrested.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or become police officers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! Police Academy, that's the thing the do!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth will get arrested, no problem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's true. Just tell me to go do something in public. That's all you need. All right. So, I'm remembering, it seems like Hotis might serve the devil of this realm, the leader, the president, as you have said a few times, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dispator.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hm, Dispator. Seems like he serves him, and is in a prison. You know what's fun, I feel like a lot of the things we were looking for this whole time are all underground. It's like an underground city. Man, this is terrifying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if that means it's just as hot underground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (exhales) Well, the good news is, once we find Hotis, it'll be super easy. The bad news is, finding Hotis? Super hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gotta find out-- I assume she's-- you've filled us all in on what you saw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm assuming I translated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So all we have to do is teleport through that tree that's underground. We can send him a small bonsai tree, as a gift.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh my god, oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah, then as soon as he wakes up--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to find the prison--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to find the prison, find out what it is, who runs it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then get in, get arrested, get--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Infiltrate, perhaps. Call a favor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a weird feeling that this prison is run by Dis-- Lord Dispater himself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: James Spader.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: James Spader.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, you said it wasn't fully formed, right? It's still, like, in its goo phase?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I the only one that feels like this is an awful lot of trouble for something that's not a problem yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The trouble is, once it becomes a problem, it continues to be a problem until you cut it off at the root.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He only stops when you kill him down here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, Grog, it's two different sets of problems. Here, he's a wee, wee bab in a chocolate egg, but getting to him is difficult. If we wait, then he gets the jump on us when we're sleeping in our beds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not in a chocolate egg?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not in a chocolate egg. Then he looks like a guy in a mascot suit at a Winter's Crest fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or like Gilmore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or like Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or like Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can't even imagine Hotis disguised as Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, what a dick move that would be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, it's now or later, it's just a different set of problems, and now we know what we're doing at least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may-- well, I'm tempted to head downstairs to have a drink, start scoping out and see who might know what's what about that prison.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, we know fucking nobody in this city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they all look like garbage, so why don't we just start with the garbage downstairs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Small question: we checked in as-- you checked in as tieflings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We have to re-alter ourselves before we go downstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For bursts of an hour, each time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we could just not talk about it and see if anyone actually notices, just see if anyone's going to be rude about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's only a few rooms in this place, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They keep a fairly close eye on their patrons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would think so-- ol' broken sausage finger may be sharper than we think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm, I have a feeling there are more eyes on us here than we even realise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, I'm really hungry, can we have that fucking Feast now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and I make a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You guys go ahead and muster the Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mark off 1,000 gold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Extra hit points, no fear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lustrous hair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shiny fingernails.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shiny fingernails. Feel like you ate a soul.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean all of our heal-- our points are healed, or are we just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you guys take a full rest, you will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Oh, that's the question I wanted to ask you: did we know if here, night and day is the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that wasn't in any of his books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You really have no idea. I mean, there are beds, there are places to stay, and from what you can tell, there are-- there is traffic from creatures that travel from different planes, probably require sleep. So, whether or not there is a day-night cycle based on any sort of improbable sun, there probably are expected day-sleep cycles for creatures that need to sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They pump oxygen in, you can stay up as late as you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No windows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Keyleth, roll 2d10.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money, no whammies! That's an eight for one, and the other, not as good. Ten total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so everyone gets a bonus of ten-- that's an average, I guess. Close to average. So, ten maximum hit point increase to everybody for the next 24 hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also, at the end of dinner say, I would like to raise a toast. To Vox Machina: for going and being together all the way into hell and back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, fingers crossed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, let's not get ahead of ourselves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We might not come back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, all the way to Hell and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To hell!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks to the wonderful guidance of the Voice of the Tempest!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighs) Oh Tary.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh jeez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keyleth of the Air Ashari and-- keep writing this down-- and to the majesty and the heroic and adventurous drive--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of Taryon Darrington!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of Tary-- Everybody, to Taryon Darrington!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To me!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What voice is this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is your "Leader" voice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is why I'm a voice actor. And--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you cheer and talk for about ten minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, cheers to Taryon Darrington and his glistening armor and his flowing locks of golden hair. And I continue for ten minutes about Taryon Darrington.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And his glistening boots of shining upkeep. And his--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's losing hit points from this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to throw up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the whole time Doty's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you get an extra 17 on that ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's temporary, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Temporary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are we inspired by hearing you talk all that shit about Tary?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because it's in the spellbook.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't feel inspired.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a frequent flyer card.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?! No! You know what, Vex, I'm still, I'm still practicing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? It's getting there. Next time, share the compliments, make all of us feel cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While Taryon notices you staring intently and she's giving this inspiring speech about how amazing he is-- Taryon looks over at you and goes, "She's hitting on me." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With his belt that is bejeweled and his very bedazzled pauldrons and his--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So over this part.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very, very manicured cuticles. And I don't know what else to say for ten minutes about Tary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we staying in? For the, for a bit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the plus side, we're all very tired now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What else is there to say about Taryon Darrington?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't ask me. Please don't ask me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing? Are you resting?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Should we? Rest? I don't even know what time it is here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could be like early morning and we could rest and then wake up in the middle of the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've only been traveling for like a few hours, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it could be a completely different time here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But it's more about your internal clock, whatever you want to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It took us quite a while to find this place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've also expended my 6th, 7th and 8th-level spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It took an hour, a little over an hour since your arrival. Since you guys did your transformations.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We went to bed, got up, and then-- what was that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that was a burp. I forgot we were filming. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You've had maybe three hours, four hours since waking up in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like noon in our internal clock, probably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should just fucking try to do something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so if we've got to find our way to some sort of prison, two options. Get arrested. Or ask people where people go who get arrested, which seems really fishy and stupid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It seemed like it was underground, almost spanning this entire city. We could possibly try and find a back entrance. I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, there's the owner downstairs, the creepy guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've already left the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Jesus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I follow him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I follow. Wait! We're not altered!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you're not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. He already went down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to come back-- Vax, Vax, Vax, Vax!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're not altered! You're not altered! Hey! Hey!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do a quick U-turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, we grab him, drag him back in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary, can he heat up to the point that he doesn't work any more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope not. Probably not. I'm going to say not."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You made him, after all. You would know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. It's fine." He looks over to Percival. "Right? He's going to be fine?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe flip? Flip sides, just keep flipping the sides.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right! All right, Doty: chest against the wall." And Doty just kind of pancakes against the door a second time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wish I had some bacon right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mm-hm?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Alter Self again, on us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see, I'm going to check the character sheet that I got sent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're god, you can do anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we're screwed, we might have to be us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We might have to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he can cast Alter Self, he goes, "I can technically do it one more time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you'll be out of other things you can do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will be out of all my things. Of the big things. I mean, I still can--" He kind of jostles a satchel he has on the side, you hear a bunch of glass and things clinking. He says, "I still have "my accoutrements. But as far my devices to help you guys out, I'm kind of spent at that point. But--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, I still look the way I did when I checked in. Looking like me going to go and do all the recon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do Alter Self at will, I'm just not the best person to talk to people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why don't we let the two of them go?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (inhales nervously)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you? Is that Grog and Keyleth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog and Keyleth. Haven't done it for a while. Grog and Minxie. (laughs nervously)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? You and I, me and the tiger?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm not saying I'd be a tiger. I'm just hearkening back to our team-up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you said Minxie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah but, I mean, I haven't stepped in lava in a while. Doesn't mean that's something I should right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you know, it's what we call a call-back? You know, don't worry about it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the best could happen? What's the best outcome here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like with Scanlan gone, our best talker is this one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Probably the two of us, possibly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are you pointing, over here? I can't see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where'd you point?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, Grog and I can be very intimidating. Right, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but it's more angry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, he might do great here. I haven't been doing so hot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but you know, I feel like in so many situations we go: "What happens if I push this "button? Let's just see what happens."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just send Grog down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But that's not what I'm saying. I'm actually arguing the opposite of that. I'm saying for once, maybe, I mean, you're a very good talker. Why don't we send the person who's good at talking down? Instead of on a lark, sending down, you know, the brute to talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but everything I've tried hasn't worked so far. Maybe they're immune to persuasion down here and maybe all they need is a little (grunts) a little jostle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe you haven't been lucky. Maybe you need to give it another shot. I mean, your average is a little bit better than the Big Man's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little intimidation check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're going to want to steal you and put you in a cage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm perfectly content to just go down there, and if anyone asks we've just changed into something more comfortable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just fucking go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both of you! You're both-- he can only do one person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Are going to change into something? Or are you just going to be totally oblivious that you're definitely not the people who walked in upstairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be totally okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have one capsule."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to be okay. He says he's got enough for everyone still.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's only got enough for one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he can do it again to all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can do it to one person"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and I go down as just backup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's up to you, Percy, dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I can do it at will.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You go, you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
