lines.text: I don't think I-- do you think with the capsule or without. I don't want to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fine, with.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, jeez. Someone pick who goes down and talks. I feel like Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just did. Percival, you're going. It's hell, this is your game now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With Grog. You're going with Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, as back-up, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be my guest."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy and Grog! Go, go, go, go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you take the coin and you kind of focus on it (fwoosh) and your form shifts back into the previous tiefling appearance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sniffs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have fun storming the castle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, let's do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sweet!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He just-- (mimics snorting cocaine)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we head down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he really? Did you take soul?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He did! He's so causal, he was like, (inhales, then roars) (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (inhales) Let's do this. Sucked it down like an oyster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as the rush hits you, you take a step and pause for a moment, because the rush is strong and familiar. It's similar to the sensation and the rush you had when you took a life with the Pepperbox when Orthax was still holding sway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That same passage of some sort of a soul energy, and as the rush hits, that familiarity itches you on the inside, and you're a little caught off-guard and made uncomfortable by it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Steady as she goes, Percival.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Too much?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little much?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Little much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little overwhelming?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be meditating upon that a little bit later. Let's head downstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come back, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I place my hands on Grog's shoulder and Percival's shoulder and cast Bless as they walk out the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys head out, into the hallway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I smack both their asses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (smack noise)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You dive in front of me to do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He gets weirdly uncomfortable. All right, so, you guys head back downstairs. The two devils that were there feasting earlier appear to have left, and the room is mostly quiet and empty now, except for the same rough-looking bartender in the corner and there, at the same table, is the red-skinned, devilish, handsome gentleman. As you walk down, you see what appears to be a small impish creature that's on his shoulder, and he's currently conversing with it quietly, and then as you guys step down, he (waving noise) to it, and it flies up, and skitters off into the distance outside of the door. Turns to you, reaches over and takes a bottle off the table and fills the goblet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What comes out of the bottle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be some deep red liquid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's merlot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Yum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's watching you, but he's not expecting any interface.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I walk over. (clears throat) Could I possibly entertain you with some company?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would-- it would be a change of pace that is quite welcome. Take a seat, both of you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The seats, as they-- they're heavy and they're not quite as-- they're heated at the base, they're warm to the touch, but they're not burning you. You both pull them up and they grind against the slate stone floor of the interior as you plop down and sit. "Shall I also fetch you a drink?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds lovely. What is actually available at this hour at this establishment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Available at the establishment, not this kind of drink. My personal reserve, "that I can offer."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would be curious, I would hate to be indebted to you at this point, but I would be very curious to try whatever it is that you consider to be your personal stash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would prefer you indebted to me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comes over with two similar goblets and places them on the table, and steps back to the corner. The gentleman takes the bottle and fills them both, kind of finishing the last bit he had in Grog's chalice, and sets it to the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What may I call you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You may call me Ipkesh. What may I call you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, Freddie will do for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Freddie?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Greg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Freddie and Greg?" (laughs) God damn it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck souls, that's a rush.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two points for Gryffindor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man, buddy cop, go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So what brings you to my fine establishment?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does the chalice smell like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Smells like a strong, alcoholic wine of some kind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take a big old sip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's good. It's very good. You're not a big fan of wine, generally, because you're more of a liquor and ale person, but as far as the wines you've had, it's pretty good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your pancreas melts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This, I'm sure you know, is really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It better be. So, what is your business?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, cards on the table, we're in town because a friend of ours got in badly with a rakshasa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(chuckles) This is not an unfamiliar tale."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We figured not, and we're definitely out of place, a bit out of sorts, and definitely out of our depths, but thank you for the rooms. I assume this is your establishment, is it not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I run it at the-- how do I say? A partnership with my betters."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, well, regardless of betters or otherwise, I'm grateful for the sanctuary. All of us are. So we, I assume, are not the first people you've met coming into town, looking for a rakshasa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not met them, but stories do swirl, and find my ears. It does all of us well here to "know what's going on."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I will admit, we have some questions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, perhaps I have some answers."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's where we think we might find our boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is a prison here, yes. I know it well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know it well, I would hope not from personal experience?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, no, no. It imprisons many things, but-- I would be blunt with you as well. We live here "under the interest of business, yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Information is a resource."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A very, very great one. There is a prison, underground, people go there. Perhaps this is an easy question to ask that will flow freewy-- freely. What is this? Why do people get sent to that prison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you have to offer for my information?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you in the market for? I have dull things, but I get the distinct impression you're not necessarily somebody who's going to be interested in coin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I prefer not to dole out small tidbits. I prefer to bundle in larger packages."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I understand. How do I know that what you have to offer is worthwhile?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a proposal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hm, tempt me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously we're interested in the prison. We're interested in somehow getting into the prison, or possibly getting our problem out of the prison. I'm not saying that we're looking for some sort of grand mastermind or otherwise, but if you feel that you're the sort of person that would have enough information in this direction of how one might get access to the prison or otherwise, and get out with their skin intact-- at least most of it-- or the sorts of people who would be interested in helping such an adventure go forward, that would be worth our while and interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Brings up a hand and snaps his finger. As it does, the entire room around both of you goes dark. Jet black. You still see the table before you, the drinks in your hand, the gentleman across the way, but everything else around you just goes complete, lightless, umbra expanse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had too much of this wine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think I've had enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we're to speak freely, it's best that we speak in a place that is safe to speak."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. He fucking teleported you guys away somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My cost for my information is high, but I can both give you what you seek and the means of "achieving what you want, but I want a favor in trade."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I hope-- If you're willing, that if we decline your offer, I hope you will take no offense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will take no offense, but those that listen might."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What I'm trying to say is, it behooves you to make this contract. So. What you seek is the "Mentiri. The Mentiri is the prison beneath the city. I can tell you more, I can get you there. I "can probably even find out who there knows of or is involved with this rakshasa. And this favor I "ask will lead you to this path." He leans forward after taking a big sip of his wine, finishing the last of it, setting it aside with a heavy (poof) on the table. "I work for Utugash, one of the "prominent owners and taskmasters involved in moving souls and soul goods throughout this area "of Dis. He is slovenly, he is lazy, he is powerful, and he needs to fall."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he a pit fiend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At one time, maybe. At this time, his laziness has left him a useless sack of demon "shit, and I have bent under his fist and brow for far too long. I have friends now in other places, "and if his business were to crumble, that void left behind could elevate me and my compatriots."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, I have friends in this prison, and the offense of travelers tearing down someone of "prominence, and yourselves being still within your very mortal coils, why that's what this prison is "designed for; for those that break the laws of the land but haven't yet passed. To be ripened. To be "kept, until they do, once the corruption has set them for the rest of our factory. So, you slay "this creature, I can see that you are safely arrested and placed with allies on the inside that "could move you around and bring you fairly close to this rakshasa you seek. That is my offer."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a fair offer. I will quietly, without naming names of any kind, confer with my compatriots and we will give you a yes or no, without naming names of any kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before we leave, and just as a personal favor. I've been touched by a demon before, by a creature. Does it show here? Can you see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a strong look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull Hex up on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you see his expression change, and he rears back and goes, "It doesn't "show, but the blood ward leaves its scar on many who exist here. Your essence is not of the Abyss, "I would not worry. But do be careful in flashing such power."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm thankful. My last question: this taskmaster of yours, the name you gave me, is it his true name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. True names, now that is an expensive trade."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One would hope. Would have made our job much easier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And mine long ago."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fair. We will meditate upon it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will say: beware the Whisperers, the golden-armored fliers, the watchers of the "archdevil himself. His paranoia seeks to know everything that goes on, and should such treachery "that we talk of be revealed, well, that would a very unfitting end to me, my compatriots, and "every one of your friends."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll just be Our Friend Downstairs for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Avoid the Whisperers." He snaps again and the sphere of darkness fades, and you're back in the tavern, unmoved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anybody looking at us strange?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. The one person in the room there, the rather bulky fellow in the corner seems to be half-asleep, almost like (sleepy lip smacking).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We finish our drinks. Keep an eye on the door, see if that strange dwarf-like creature shows up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You finish your drinks over the next couple of minutes or so-- it wasn't a heavy pour. Ipkesh just intensely, with a slight smile, looks you both over as you all quietly assess your positions in the discussion. No sign of that individual you saw earlier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've made up my mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, the rest have to do the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, it's you and me down here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're going up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want your glasses back, we decide here and now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We head up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How'd it go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, our friend downstairs says be careful of what you talk about out loud. It's pretty standard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Apparently people are listening to everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like in here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So no names. No specifics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God, it's good to be so cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well. It's pretty typical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty is writing that. Tary goes, "Don't-- don't write that down."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many empty soul stones did she have while we were gone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've had none! This place is just so hot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, we switch back to Little Elf Boy, Little Elf Girl, Antlers, Greg.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I definitely would recommend everybody not use their real names. That's something I should've pointed out earlier. Nothing here is using its real name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you ask him if you don't look like a tiefling if people are going to notice?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't. But I asked him some other things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think it matters, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think it matters, either.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you find out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, there's a prison underneath the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Knew that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our friend says he can probably, very likely get us in there and get us close enough to deal with our problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the catch?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We gotta kill someone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the typical catch. We have to do him a favor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then get arrested for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or he'll arrange for us to be arrested.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understood that we kill him, then when we go to the prison, he knows people in the prison who would make sure that we find our way to the right places. But that's the shady part.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who do we kill? The person you just spoke to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Someone else?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone else whose name I will not say out loud for now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. But you know it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. How would we do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well-- How do we ever do anything? (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And why does he want this certain someone killed? I'm sure it's out of politics?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Business.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Business.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just evil versus evil here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's really actually quite convenient that there's no such thing as the right thing to do. It just sort of takes so many things off the table here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm. You're not going to throw a rock and hit an innocent person in this city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the rock is probably the most innocent person that you're going to throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if somebody threw a rock and hit us? We're quite innocent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right-- Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be a contract, we would be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Tary is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A contract?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything here is a contract.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But Tary's exclusive, he can't sign any more contracts!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's true! You told me that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He would not be signing the contract.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Don't say his name!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, Barry! Barry's exclusive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Barry Barrington.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Barry Barrington!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't like this at all."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Chin up, Barry. (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Barry Barrington-- (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (chuckles) It's better than--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't write that either!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- Perry Paddington.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Berenstain Bear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Barry Paddington is actually-- has got a nice ring to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, if we've got your code name, what'll we call you?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Freddie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Freddie. Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wouldn't know that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And Greg.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that, I mean, that kind of is your name, is that all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not really, it's a bit of it. It's off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I still like D-Roll, but whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: D-Roll's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: D-Roll's fine, just don't use any real first or last names, nothing you would sign to a piece of parchment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Freddie, how do you feel about this plan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel good about it. I feel like it's a terrible idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. But do you have any amendments to it? Would you change it somehow?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would just confirm with someone of reason that we're to do this and get arrested for it, or we're to do this and otherwise--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, how wonderful would it be if Scanlan could just Dimension Door-- Oh, I shouldn't have said his name. Could just Dimension Door down to that thing, to the room, and just slice up the little egg, and then--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's to say where he's going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- bamf out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we can't, can we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I'm not trying to prevent us from following this plan, but we were warned not to make any deals with any creature--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We definitely made a deal between ourselves before we came down here: no contracts, no deals.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't agree to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the first thing we do, is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make a contract.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I sort of knew we would have to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But do we need help getting arrested? I'm kind of with Grog! All I have to do is walk out into the square and open my mouth, and then I'll get arrested.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we just want to get arrested? Or do we want to actually end up where we need to be?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So my thought, right? Is that I think we have to be arrested. Breaking into a prison seems real tough. At least with this guy's plan, if he's lying, the worst we get is just straight-up arrested, which I would assume means all our toys get confiscated, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, not all of us go on the killing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A couple of us go and get arrested--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. And if he's a man of his word, then those people that are in get led along to this magic place where you can go and smash Chicken Little.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the rest of us can follow along?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But if he's a lying piece of shit, like I'm sure everyone else is, we're going to need someone on the outside--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get the distinct impression that most people here are painstakingly honest, which is the horrifying thing about a place like this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that they-- that there's a lot of lying by omission.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a thing. Might be helpful while we're here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The oil can cover someone of my size, maybe Scanlan's size, and it lets you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No Scanlan! (laughs) Well, he's not here--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lets you walk through the Ethereal Plane for an hour, so you can sort of bypass where you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) It's like wearing the Ring, the One Ring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little bit, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, you walk through walls?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, you're walking on a whole parallel--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dimension?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The way it was explained to me, on this piece of paper, is that you are parallel to where you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will say, having--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't pick anything up, I don't think, can't--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- having Truesight, if anything has Truesight, like the archdevils--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure they can see into the Ethereal Plane, with Truesight. But that's only the archdevils who might have it, but it is illusory magic, I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How does it say it on the item?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it's the effect of the Etherealness spell, for one hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh right and so, for that-- the specifics on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was trying to sprinkle fairy dust on it, but let's just go to the rules, shall we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see here, 4th-- 8th-level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Cause I think anything with Truesight can see into the Ethereal Plane, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is like Nazgűl KY.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. It says: You remain in the Border Ethereal for the duration, or until you use your action to dismiss the spell. During this time, you can move in any direction. You can see and hear the Plane you originated from, but everything there looks gray, so yeah, it's like The One Ring, but you can shift in any direction. You can only--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it considered illusory magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Transmutation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is Transmutation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While on the Ethereal Plane, you can only affect and be affected by other creatures in that Plane. Creatures that aren't in the Ethereal Plane can't perceive you, can't interact with you, unless a special ability or magic has given them the ability to do so. You ignore all objects and effects that aren't on the Ethereal Plane, allowing you to move through objects you perceive on the Plane you originated from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God, I really wish we had the stones with us now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but it's a-- this is a slow-moving one-way ticket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I could use it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, you could find your way down there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, or if we get trapped, one of us could lather up and get out. I mean, I don't know what-- we don't really know what we're dealing with yet, but it's just good to know that we have it in our back pocket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, with Shapechange, I can change down to one of these little weird, eight-winged insects we've seen flying around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Imps, imps.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And do what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then change into something bigger and squish the egg.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't think they won't notice that you're an imp that doesn't belong to anybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not an imp. It's an insect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The little insects that have we've been seeing flying around that might be little, tiny, very tiny imps, I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, it's not a bad idea. Lot of variables, but it's a pretty good idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do keep in mind, when you Shapechange, you maintain the hit points of whatever--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of whatever I change into. So if I get down there and I get caught--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll bamf into yourself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll bamf into myself. So, the way Shapechange works, is whatever I assume first-- we need to clarify this later, not now, 'cause it's like whatever you had before, is what you have. So do you just have 1 HP the whole time, based on whatever you changed into first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. So, if you turn into a dragon with 300 hit points, that's great. The next thing you turn into cannot have more than 300 hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, but if it goes down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it gets damaged down to, say, ten hit points, and then you turn into a different kind of dragon, that dragon will still have ten hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or if you turn into a fly that has one hit point max, and then back into a dragon, it'll be a dragon with--

lines.name: MARISHA, MATT
lines.text: -- one hit point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cannot regain hit points by changing forms with the spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it's whatever I had before. So I can't change into something awesome, then change into something less awesome--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Crappy, and then back into something awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- and still have its hit points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do it, but you'll-- whenever you squeeze through to the tiny hit points, those carry over into the big creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're saying you don't bring your 300 dragon hit points down into the fly body, you switch to-- you switch to fly hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless it's the last resort, or you have a way out, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we go perform the hit, and then we leave Tary, I mean Barry, to get arrested. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just-- well, no, we're going to do that, all of us, right?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like super-secret spy. No, this is a very privileged role.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, big-time macho-man stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you going to get me out of the prison?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Prison Break-style. It'd be so dramatic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just don't think we should do that to Barry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's ready for more responsibility, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really don't feel like he is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think she might be right in this instance, but, if we're going together and you "guys stay around me. We're a team, right? That's what teams do, we do things as a team! Vox "Machina--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say our name. Don't whisper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grox Dock-in-da-- Stop writing it down, Doty!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Box Cockina.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whomp-whomp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, do we say yes to this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, dear lord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To doing the hit and then going to prison?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, what else are we going to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, no, I'm not arguing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) Don't say no to this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, me too!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what did we just agree to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To killing an archdevil.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're taking this contract?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not an archdevil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait a second, wait a second. When you peeked into Hotis--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Killing a greater devil. There's a big difference.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Archdevil is the Pope of this area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When she peeked-- I'm asking Keyleth, but you might need to come in here with detail. When you peeked in at Hotis, what-- Like, how much security was around him. What was around him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Didn't really see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Didn't see. Just saw a Cadbury egg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flashes of interior--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It comes in pulses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and like (bff) and then all of a sudden--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Definitely something big with big, red, flashing wings, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Archdevil or no. Hard to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could be, like, a pit fiend or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm getting the idea that maybe Hotis serves Dispater? Dis--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dispater, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Dispater. Yeah, kind of think he serves him, so we're kind of maybe going in to kill one of his literal secret spies. Think it's kind of what's going on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, kill the thing, get arrested, possible bug Keyleth, possible ethereal Keyleth as ways to get in and out. Possibly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I can always Beast Shape there, then have Shapechange later. You know, I can do the whole be a flying squirrel in someone's pocket, like we've done before, type of thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, once we kill this thing, which we will, we're diving into the unknown.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we all want to kill the thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once we kill this thing, we Plane Shift out of here faster than you can say-- Oh, oh, we're--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the owner's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see what would be most advantageous for getting what we want out of this situation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so he gets what he wants and then we see if we get what we want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How easy is it going to be to kill this--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It won't be easy! Let's be honest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- mysterious person?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is going to suck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, we had a fucking nanny who used to tell us nightmare stories about this. It's way worse than she described it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pit fiend-ish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, wait, we're expecting two of you to kill something pit fiend-ish level--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, all of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I-- what? What is happening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All of us. We're going to kill this thing--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we all kill the thing and then two of you get arrested and then the rest of us follow you?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: All of us get arrested.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all getting arrested now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, mm-hm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's much better!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happened to like two of us getting arrested?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's much better, I like that plan."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Explain to me about the contract. So, in the contract, if he doesn't hold up his end of the bargain, like, he explodes or something, right? It's a magic contract?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will quite possibly be a magic contract.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not going to have to sign anything, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because if we get arrested, and they take all our goodies, and we're in a cell, I'm going to kill all of you with my bare hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just want to take it to you and see if everyone thinks that we're going this direction. We'll make the most comfortable deal we can, but honestly, I'm very curious if anybody has any better ideas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've already gone to hell. Let's also go to prison!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could try and just straight-up espionage--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Prison assault.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Without signing any contracts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Full-frontal assault on a demon prison in the basement of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not saying full-frontal, I'm saying--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, walk us through it again. Walk me through it again, one more time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're stealthy motherfuckers, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know where the prison is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tary raises his hand slowly, "Doty, put your hand up."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are the least stealthy people I think I've ever seen, and we know Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean no offense, big guy, but--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nothing."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nothing."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Su-- Nothing at all."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His boots are made of fur.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know, they're beautiful. Did you make those?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're very quiet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you two, Kerry, are very loud. Is what you're saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(squeaky voice) I get nervous."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Barry, is there any way that you can, like, (sighs) condense Doty? Put him in your po-- No?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody else is mediocre or worse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm really good. Okay? Really good. I know you're talking about you and your sister, but I'm really good, too. Just want to point that out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lava.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. Off. Percy. Fuck off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That had nothing to do with stealth. That had straight only to do with dexterity, which is not my strong suit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Beekus, you just said his real name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs) Freddie. Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, hey, Freddie, like, how long do you think guy downstairs will give us to decide?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figure-- Well, if we're going to do this, I think we should do it quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably listening to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, they're not. I'm getting--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not supposed to make any deals. We could just try and do it on our own. The deal might put us in a position where we're totally fucked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't even know where the prison is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) But we could find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you cast Locate Creature right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! Yes, I can!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just cast it and see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I 100% can!

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fucking cast Locate Creature!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See, part of our problem is sometimes-- always, we grab the first opportunity in front of our fucking faces, so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Isn't that the way life is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's explore this opportunity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What level are you casting Locate Creature at?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Level? It's a level two-- a level four spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will that work on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cannot cast it at a higher level. Well, you can cast it at a higher level, but there's no effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't do anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I was curious if he has a blind spot or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, you take a moment, you finish casting Locate Creature. You concentrate once again on Hotis, keeping a very clear image of what you saw in the Scry spell. As you complete the spell--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ho-Dis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it's a level fucking four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the creature has to be within 1000 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it has to be within-- But it lasts for an hour. It's a concentration spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just take off running around the city, man. Boom! Marathon Woman. Go get it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can fly. I can look and fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Turn into an imp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) She's a maniac, man-- oh, he's down there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could go right now and fly around while it lasts for an hour. Do a quick scout.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you fly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With fucking Beast Shape by being like a beasty thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you do that and concentrate at the same time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. That's at-will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure off, go on. Fly off by yourself, nobody cares.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go with her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not a-- well, it doesn't matter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not what? What am I not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A tiefling anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. But she's a big fucking bird, I mean--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have to be a big fucking bird--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She could be a succubus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- I could be literally a tiny fucking bird, or a succubus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, do your thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I am a succubus, though, it's burning my 9th-level spell and we're done for the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get captured or eaten out there, we're done for the night anyway. (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hell is tearing this team apart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What were the weird imp things that I saw flying around?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Imps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are the golden armored things

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The gold armor imps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are impish creatures with golden armor that you saw at a distance in the sky above.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was there anything else flying other than them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were other creatures flying, but they were too far away to really make up any decent-- and some of them of them were just imps, just the tiny little devils that fly around, and there were some that seemed a little larger with humanoid bodies and giant, leathery wings that were just coasting through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you said this is like the biggest city we've ever seen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are things that fly here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are many things that fly. The first thing you saw when you looked up in the sky was at least a dozen or so winged creatures all up in the clouds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can go. Going to the window. Anyone stopping me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no window, it's just wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no windows. Anyone stopping me as I Alter Self and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is your game, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- head towards the door? No?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one? All right, I'm going to go do a quick pass. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, gosh. Be careful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She becomes leader of the Ashari and dies as soon as she gets to hell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go get it, keep going. Momentum!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, all right, all right, all right, all right. I'm going to Shapechange.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're casting Shapechange, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Level nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what are you turning into?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do a succubus. I know I've got a good look at them and they can fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, are succubuses devils down here or are they demons?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're devils.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those are devils, and we saw one under Krieg's house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're fiends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. They're fiends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they're kind of rogue agents. I'm hoping no one questions this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you have succubus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. Okay. Mm. Just-- quick loop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ermahgerd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, ermahgerd--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ermahgerd.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I, as the tiefling, walk out of the tavern, just very intent on my direction. As I walk out of the building, I take a left, hang down an alleyway, check over my shoulder, make sure no one's watching and then (fwoof) into a succubus and take off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a stealth check real fast.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking hell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fucking hell is right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) Highway to the danger zone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a straight-- oh, that's good, that's good. 20 total. No, no, 21 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I forgot my proficiency bonus went up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you exit the building and turn right and into the alleyway, being careful not to be seen in your tiefling form, begin to cast the spell as you see two shadows step into the entranceway of the alleyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope. I stop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you stop it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, and I just kind of keep walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just keep walking? Okay. You don't even look back, you just keep walking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keep walking, and you hear footsteps behind you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start blocking around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two sets of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Peek over my shoulder. Do I get a glimpse on who they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see what appears to be a squat, kind of tan-skinned dwarf-like figure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the dwarf again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The features, like you expect to see a dwarf, appears to be a female dwarf of some kind, but there's some sort of physical alteration's taken place. They look like they've been either very injured and healed wrong, or some sort of corruption has taken place. But it's walking forward with this hobbling gait, and to the left you see the other entity that is just wrapped in chains, and they're about 30 feet behind you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30 feet behind me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 30 feet behind you, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we alone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just in this small alleyway off in the building that's immediately adjacent to the structure where you're staying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still, I imagine, within range of the tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just gonna say, I'm being followed so be on alert. Same dwarven chainy figure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we come out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you need us out there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, just wait a second, I'll say Jenga if need be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stretching.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stop, about-face, and light up my hands and keep the hood up. And just say, I know you're there. What do you want, and who are you? Keep the hood up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Head's down. The footsteps slow when they get about 20 feet from you. And they stop. You keep your head down. The dwarf figure brings one weird, swollen, twisted arm in front of the other, crosses it. The chained figure, you hear all the jangling, shifting, and as you get a better glance over your shoulder towards it, you can see the chains that dangle don't just dangle, they're all kind of slowly shifting and spinning around, like hundreds of small snakes that are just readjusting and moving across the body. You can see its eyes, part of its nose through as the chains pull across and hide most of its features. The skin itself a deep, deep pinkish-red, like a normal body that's been constricted so much that all the blood has rushed to the surface.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Off-the-cuff, do they seem familiar? Any idea on who they might be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. But there is a heavy breathing from the female dwarf figure that just-- they glance at each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, do you want to tell me? You want to tell me who you are? 'Cause I don't have a lot of time to deal with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chained one says, "You seem to walk with a white one."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's asking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am asking."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'I' could be referred to many people, including myself. So I am asking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Silence. You will bring us the white one, or you will be tribute yourself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you want with him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no response.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think you'd want me as tribute, so you'd best bet tell me what you want with him, because maybe we could strike a deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The white one caught the attention of a creature that I wish to see pleased."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, is this creature willing to make a deal? Because the white one belongs to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have ownership of the white one?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not really lying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not entirely wrong, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hm." You hear the chains intensify with the rattling and clanking. "Perhaps you should walk "with us."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are we going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To the one who wishes to now know of your ownership."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And if I decline?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then you will no longer be able to stop us."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, I still didn't catch your name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all groan)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, what?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! I love Hells, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 11AM, or 11PM, and that's a fun place to pick up next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh. Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could be many people, it could all f-- Silence! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or that, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's kind of a pejorative, you know. Do we need to know like-- what kind of "I"? Is this this royal "I"?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's royal "we".

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The royal "we"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just in case.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Multiple bags.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can leave them here now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm doing that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't burn the spell, right? I stopped it, I didn't burn the spell, I stopped it. Right? Because I was like "Cancel cancel cancel", come on, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My vibe is it didn't burn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought it didn't burn either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll-- what's your passive perception actually?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My passive perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's becoming a problem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? I'll say you cancelled it, you did manage to just catch their movement out of the corner of your eye, just as you entered the alleyway, and you-- just as you were about to begin the spell, they arrived.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's only because they didn't roll very high stealth themselves. Well, cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking hell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much. Literally. Fucking Hells. Plural, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Things aren't going very well here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they're going great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is fun. I love--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not slaves yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, bonus!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love the City of Dis. You guys just scraped the surface. All right, so we'll be back here next week on Thursday. We'll also be-- some of us will be here on Tuesday, for Talks Machina at seven. We'll talk about this chaos. We'll be at Wondercon, April 1st, 2-3PM for our Critical Role panel, please come and see us. Thank you again for Puzzle Quest for being our awesome sponsor today.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay, Puzzle Quest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So check out Marvel Puzzle Quest, and until next week guys, is it Thursday yet? Good night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are in deep shit! [music]
